products.title: Word Search of Newfoundland and Labrador - Volume One
products.description: Say hello to the Word Search of Newfoundland and Labrador, the ultimate puzzle book for word search enthusiasts and lovers of this stunning place we call home. Featuring 140 puzzles ranging from easy to challenging, each word search will give you an opportunity to learn something new about this province. From our culture, to our landmarks, to our history, to our sayings, to our diverse communities, to fast facts, to our friends (and even folks you may know), each puzzle is carefully crafted to ensure that every word you find is one you can add to your Newfoundland vocabulary.

products.title: Pease Pudding Bag
products.description: Use to make traditional 'Pease Pudding', a famous accompaniment for Jiggs Dinner.  Fill bag with peas to desired amount.  Use ties to secure top of bag.  if peas do not fill bag, fold down top before securing ties to leave a suitable amount of slack.  Hook a fork in the loop at bottom of bag to shake hot pudding from bag.  If you prefer a drier pudding, squeeze some water from the bag before removing. Features making this the best bag are sturdy ties instead of string, loop on bottom for handling hot bag; finished interior seams means no stray threads in pudding. 65% polyester 35% cotton & double seamed for durability. Made in Newfoundland. Launder before initial use. Machine wash & dry.

products.title: A Puffin Playing by the Sea - The Twelve Days of Christmas by Gina Noordhof
products.description: The classic holiday carol The 12 Days of Christmas takes on a Newfoundland and Labrador twist in this cute children's book. Instead of a partridge in a pear tree, the first day of Christmas brings a puffin by the sea; other Newfoundland and Labrador-themed gifts include caribou, Norsemen, mummers - and even caroling codfish! Plus, the author provides interesting background information on each of the 12 gifts. It highlights the unique qualities of this Canadian province in a fun, heart filled and educational manner. With the help of the whimsical puffin character and beautiful illustrations by Derek Peddle , Gina Noordhof's first book will be certain to please young and old. It will appeal to people from around the world who want to learn about the province and those who are proud of their birthplace and its unique history and nature. This is a first in a series of books that will exhibit each provinces qualities. Singalong to the this soon to be New hit song, The Twelve Days of Christmas in Newfoundland and Labrador

products.title: Caramel Log
products.description: A wafer and caramel biscuit fully covered in chocolate flavoured coating sprinkled with roasted coconut. Biscuit 32g.

products.title: Moose Trigger Mitt
products.description: This very warm double knit mitten features the thumb and finger. Very popular with hunters and fisherman. Suitable for all chilly outdoor activities. It has a stretchy knit two, purl two ribbed band that tucks in nicely. Hand knit with 100 % wool, worsted weight.

products.title: Moose Cap
products.description: This toque style cap has a turned up knit two, purl two ribbed edge. The moose silhouette section is double knit. It is a stretchy fit so it will be comfortable for average to larger size. It has a handmade tassel attached with a braided wool cord. Designed by Christine LeGrow. Hand knit with 100% wool, worsted weight.

products.title: Traditional Newfoundland Work Sock
products.description: This traditional hand knit work sock is the perfect answer to keep the feet warm in all outdoor activities.  It is a generous width and has a comfort knit two, purl two ribbed band. Hand knit 100% wool, worsted weight.

products.title: Traditional Newfoundland Vamp
products.description: This very short sock is typically worn over another sock of choice. Wear it when added warmth is needed for the foot but not the leg. It is great to wear as a slipper too. It has a knit one, purl one, ribbed edge and a stocking stitch foot. Hand knit, 100% wool, worsted weight.

products.title: Republic of Newfoundland Flap Cap
products.description: This republic ear flap cap has two tri-colour flags. One on each ear flap. The cap is warm and cosy with a double knit section of white starbursts on a medium grey background.  This style is best worn pulled well down over the head.  It features three handmade pom-poms in the Republic of Nfld. colours, attached with hand knotted wool cord. Designed and hand knit by Laurie LeGrow. Hand knit with 100% wool, worsted weight.

products.title: Republic of Newfoundland Turn-Back Sock
products.description: This hiking sock is meant to be worn in short hiking boots and shoes. The moss stitch cuff has a slit at the back, so that it can easily turn back over a short boot. The underside is a trim knit one, purl one ribbing that fits snugly around the ankle. The foot is a traditional stocking stitch knit. It has a flag on the outside ankle of each foot. This cosy sock can be worn as a slipper. Designed by Christine LeGrow.

products.title: Inky Old Squids - Cat Toys
products.description: Our Inky Old Squids are made from 100% sheep wool and organic catnip. Our most popular cat toy is perfect for cats that like to pull and bite on things that dangle. Their dangly tentacles are sure to please.

products.title: Capelin Guys - Cat Toys
products.description: Our Capelin Guys are made from 100% sheep wool and organic catnip. They are perfect for cats that like to bat their toys around.

products.title: The Saucy Newfoundland Co. : Lassie Ketchup
products.description: This really isn't your Mudder's ketchup, but she says she really loves it! She says its a fancy way to spruce up her meals. The lassy is our attempt to make this saucy crowd a little sweeter. Mudder says it isn't working!
